item.title:
RT by @fede_intern: Aligned's Community Offering on @CoinList has begun.
These are the main details:
Ends: 17:00 UTC Jan 23rd
CoinList Offering: https://coinlist.co/aligned
Blog: https://blog.coinlist.co/announcing-the-aligned-token-sale-on-coinlist/
Results will be shared in the days following the conclusion of the offering.
*This is not available to users in the US (and its territories), CA, and others. This is taking place exclusively on CoinList, beware of scams.

item.title:
RT by @fede_intern: i have a dream that one day all of finance will move onchain.
that people around the world will be able to trade with each other without having to worry about centralization or counter party risks.
that the global pooling of liquidity will enable better prices ‚Äî creating equitable free markets for all.
that the world will become increasingly tokenized, and that the global token exchange will be the main trading venue for all sorts of assets, not just crypto.
i have a dream.
and today, we are one step closer to making that dream a reality.
thank you, and I promise, we won‚Äôt let you down.
item.dc:creator: @enzo_gte
item.description:
i have a dream that one day all of finance will move onchain.

that people around the world will be able to trade with each other without having to worry about centralization or counter party risks.

that the global pooling of liquidity will enable better prices ‚Äî creating equitable free markets for all.

that the world will become increasingly tokenized, and that the global token exchange will be the main trading venue for all sorts of assets, not just crypto.

i have a dream.

and today, we are one step closer to making that dream a reality.

thank you, and I promise, we won‚Äôt let you down.

nitter.freedit.eu/GTE_XYZ/status/1879921576537158071#m

item.dc:creator: @eigenlayer
item.description:
Filming, editing, and cheffing by @srachasaucee.

Follow the whole student ecosystem below!
@blockchainASU @bu__blockchain @StanfordCrypto @CalBlockchain @CMUBlockchain @_CUBlockchain_ @BlockchainatCU @dalbcs @Voxchain @BlockchainEmory @Blockchain_GT @harvard_crypto @ITA_Blockchain @MITSloanCrypto @nyubnf @NEU_Blockchain @pton_blockchain @BoilerChain @ubcblockchain_ @UofCBlockchain @blockchainucla @BlockchainUCSB @ucblockchain @GatorBlockchain @ILL_Blockchain @UMichBlockchain @umnblockchain @oregonblock @franklin_dao @PennBlockchain @0xBlockchainSC @txblockchain @udubblockchain @wlooblockchain @BadgerBlock @VandyBlockchain @YaleBlockchain @NU_Blockchain

A huge thank you to our first batch of incredible EigenSponsors:
@Gaianet_AI @0xOthentic @0xautonome

Much more to come.

item.title:
Congrats @zksync. I really like that you guys are focusing on institutions and big players.
You are bringing new players to Ethereum and ZK to make the pie bigger. In this case Tradable was already on chain but many of the ZK chains are being built by people that weren't big yet in crypto
Great work @gluk64.
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern
item.description:

Great work @gluk64.

item.title:
Congrats.
This is great. I really like @IrreducibleHW and @RiscZero.
Binius will be used almost anywhere. It has some advantages over Circle STARKs and some disadvantages.
Hashed based proving is the way to go and we have been saying this for a few years.
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern
item.description:
Congrats.

This is great. I really like @IrreducibleHW and @RiscZero.

Binius will be used almost anywhere. It has some advantages over Circle STARKs and some disadvantages.

Hashed based proving is the way to go and we have been saying this for a few years.

item.title:
RT by @fede_intern: Today, EigenDA its total value secured (TVS) increased 4300x from @aevoxyz's migration.
Goal: another 25x from here in Q1 üéÜ
@aevoxyz is one of the earliest derivative platforms, started in 2020. We are excited to play a part in their journey and product vision.
Exciting times ahead üî•
item.dc:creator: @0xkydo
item.description:
Today, EigenDA its total value secured (TVS) increased 4300x from @aevoxyz's migration.

Goal: another 25x from here in Q1 üéÜ

@aevoxyz is one of the earliest derivative platforms, started in 2020. We are excited to play a part in their journey and product vision.

Exciting times ahead üî•

nitter.freedit.eu/aevoxyz/status/1879728286093479947#m
